name: GS Equity Compensation RPG Game Prototype
name_original: GS Equity Compensation RPG Game Prototype
description:
Clicking on the "Run Game" icon will open a new tab to play the game.

Please note: Opening game music is really loud by default, so make sure speakers are set to low.

Instructions to Play

On a PC or Mac

  1. Use the mouse or arrow keys to move around.
  2. Click on characters and objects e.g. books, or press "Enter" to interact.
  3. Press the "Esc" key to pause or access audio settings in the Settings menu.

On a Tablet or Phone

  1. Tap anywhere to move.
  2. Tap on characters and objects e.g. books, to interact.
  3. Tap with two fingers to pause, go back, and resume the game.
